accessories.name: Dispelling Beads
accessories.profile: Prayer beads said to absorb impurity. While they protect their bearer, the misfortune accumulated within the beads may eventually bring calamity.

accessories.name: Sturmhond
accessories.profile: Heavenly gauntlets of thunder that only knights chosen by the god of lightning are permitted to wear.

accessories.name: The Dragonbinder
accessories.profile: A sealing collar used by the legendary dragon hunter. Under its curse, any dragon becomes as helpless as an infant.

accessories.name: Frostlite Kubanka
accessories.profile: A queen's treasure passed down from her mother in a certain land of ice. The hat contains an eternal warmth, undiminished by any blizzard.

accessories.name: Apocalypse Hat
accessories.profile: A hat once worn by the leader of a certain religious cult. It is made from a material unknown to this world.

accessories.name: Cloak of Dawn
accessories.profile: Shrouded in a dark radiance, this cloak pulses with the unyielding will of one destined to reshape the course of history.

accessories.name: Silverlight Armor
accessories.profile: Gleaming like moonlight, this armor was forged specially for the proud and noble order. Its weight is such that no ordinary knight can walk, let alone fight in it.

accessories.name: World Clock
accessories.profile: A small clock under the protection of Chronos. If its hands stop moving, that is when time itself will cease to flow.

accessories.name: The Royal Sapphire
accessories.profile: A royal jewel entrusted to Elizabeth by her mother. Its brilliances reflects the grand nobility of their hearts.

accessories.name: Mask of a Thief
accessories.profile: Shrouded in mystery, the mask gleams in the light of this one-night stage.

accessories.name: Thundering Turret
accessories.profile: The barrels of the three cannons unleash thunderous blasts of fire, decimating the whole battlefield.

accessories.name: Lovers' Oath
accessories.profile: A set of two pendants, each adorned with half a gemstone—one that was split by a certain couple as they promised each other undying love. Should life ever separate them, the gems will surely bring them back together.

accessories.name: Kisen Scroll
accessories.profile: One of 200 scrolls researched over many long years, said to contain the medical, military, and metallurgical secrets of the bikki race.

accessories.name: Mermaid's Teardrop
accessories.profile: Every so often, the pearl could hear a mermaid's voice from the safety of its shell. Her song echoing throughout the seas was the reflection of her compassionate heart—and at the same time, the cue for everyone to forget her.

accessories.name: King of Camelot
accessories.profile: A symbol of royal majesty and wisdom. Passed down from generation to generation, it marks the true king of Camelot.

accessories.name: Voice of Woe
accessories.profile: Should you ever hear the sweet tune of this harp on the battlefield, abandon all hope. For it is your requiem that it shall play.

accessories.name: Pale Blue Haori
accessories.profile: The uniform presented to each member of the Shinsengumi by its commander. Hijikata never wore it, saying it restricted movements. Okita never wore it, saying it was tacky. Deep in their hearts, though, they both just didn't want to get it dirty. On the back, the fabric is emblazoned with the character for "truth."

accessories.name: Lugrasse's Star
accessories.profile: The distinction awarded by the first empress of Lugrasse to a group of knights from the kingdom across the sea. It is a token of her gratitude for saving the world, as well as an apology for involving them in a crisis of her own making.

accessories.name: Boltblast Helmet
accessories.profile: Blue sky and white lightning meet in this helmet, which boasts both the defensive power to withstand lightning strikes and the flexibility of an ever-changing sky.

accessories.name: Will Unto Eternity
accessories.profile: A mythical shield said to have existed since the world began. Legend says it cleanses the soul of the one who possesses it, eventually leading them to a higher plane of existence.

accessories.name: Butterfly Hairpin
accessories.profile: One of very few things Lü Bu has obtained in a legitimate way. Considering that she actually bought two, perhaps she intended to give the one she doesn't wear to someone special.

accessories.name: Blueflash Armor
accessories.profile: Top-quality, tidily forged armor that's extremely lightweight. It takes its name from the appearance of lightning flashing across the sky.

accessories.name: Glowing Aegis
accessories.profile: A crimson aegis stone created to protect its bearer from all of the world's misfortunes. Those who possess this stone will be steered clear of bad luck.

accessories.name: Scute of Finality
accessories.profile: The cursed shades of the underworld given form. Guards the boundary between life and death.

accessories.name: Azure Elegy Helm
accessories.profile: A helmet imbued with the power of Kaidaros, legendary Dragon of the Sea. Constructed to withstand rough currents, it's prized in underwater battles.

accessories.name: Inferno Armor
accessories.profile: Armor imbued with the flames of Fornaxos, legendary Dragon of Fire. It's said to be impervious even to boiling magma.

accessories.name: Heathen Dagger
accessories.profile: A taboo dagger that grants tremendous might to wielders who worship a certain god. It's said to be so dangerous that even the god's own cult kept it strictly under wraps.

accessories.name: Gluttonous Shield
accessories.profile: Less a shield than a beast possessed of a rapacious hunger, it absorbs incoming blows as though devouring them.

accessories.name: Hel's Almuce
accessories.profile: Descended from darkness, embracing darkness, returning to darkness. The wearer of this cloak will not fear darkness, but become its kin, with darkness as their mother.

accessories.name: Prized Aquakabuto
accessories.profile: Five pieces of armor, said to have been forged by the legendary bikki craftsman Goji long, long ago, are carefully guarded as prized treasures of the bikki race.

accessories.name: Crown of Flowers
accessories.profile: Let's make these again someday! The casual promise exchanged in her younger days remains etched into her mind even now.

accessories.name: OWM-Armor
accessories.profile: Made of an unknown substance harder than even diamond. Scholars whisper that it's an artifact of a mysterious ancient civilization.

accessories.name: Everlight Ring
accessories.profile: A mythical ring said to have existed since the world began. The wearer is said to be granted eternal tranquility.

accessories.name: Prized Suehiro
accessories.profile: A fine piece, made with a master craftsman's ingenuity. Like a willow swaying in the wind, one touch and enemy attacks are rendered powerless.

accessories.name: Scenic Snowband
accessories.profile: A legendary ring from the snowy northern lands. Its beautiful gem, rumored to contain a snow spirit, captivates all who behold it.

accessories.name: The Select's Helm
accessories.profile: A helmet bestowed only upon the chosen ones who have passed a trial. It grants the wearer the mental strength to go on even when they've lost the will to fight.

accessories.name: Orcanix's Aegis
accessories.profile: I refuse, I refuse! I reject everything. Life, death—I repudiate it all.

accessories.name: Evershade Armor
accessories.profile: The armor wasn't entirely the color of shadows. Just like the dragon it was crafted to resemble wasn't always entirely evil.

accessories.name: Sword Diagram
accessories.profile: Blueprint for the sealing sword Exeternia. Drawn up by a genius magic scholar, it uses formulas only she can decipher; other scholars have been unable to replicate the sword.

accessories.name: Daybreak Band
accessories.profile: A priceless ring set with a jewel containing all the world's curses and blessings.

accessories.name: Bolt-Bearer Helm
accessories.profile: The lightning bolts on this helm are said to help boost the wearer's physical abilities.

accessories.name: Maiden's Banner
accessories.profile: Under the holy maiden's banner, the people were inspired, a hero arose—and the angel smiled.

accessories.name: Found Fathoms
accessories.profile: Armor beloved by the pirate Dargarossa, found decorating the depths of a treasure trove. It's said to have revived a human who died to the sea while wearing it.

accessories.name: The Devil
accessories.profile: Fifteenth Arcana of the Tarot. Reversed, it signifies duplicity, corruption, and inescapable fate. A child of adultery, the man grew to love the Tarot—not knowing that fate cannot be deceived.

accessories.name: Champion's Belt
accessories.profile: A belt that has adorned the waists of champions, berserkers, blackguards, and kings. Who will be the next to claim it?

accessories.name: Bunny Headband
accessories.profile: A headband worn as part of the uniform in Orka's casino. It took Rizette a while to find the resolve to put this on.

accessories.name: Maid's Bonnet
accessories.profile: She will likely continue wearing it forever.

accessories.name: Ebony Crown
accessories.profile: The dark crown worn by Snow Black. A manifestation of dark magic, seething with hatred and despair.

accessories.name: Sage's Katashiro
accessories.profile: A paper katashiro inscribed with the seal of the Great Sage. It is said to ward off all manner of misfortune and harm.

accessories.name: Booster Shot
accessories.profile: Many people hate going to the doctor. The smell, the scrutiny, and of course, the inevitable shots make the whole affair uncomfortable to be sure. But who could ever be afraid of a needle as cute as this one?

accessories.name: Trusty Microphone
accessories.profile: Mirai Narukami, number one idol across all global charts, sings with the voice of the Goddess. Does a Goddess need a microphone to be heard?

accessories.name: Santa Claws
accessories.profile: "Dear Santa,

accessories.name: Devilish Schoolbag
accessories.profile: Hibiki never leaves her room without the essentials: her phone, her lip gloss, her kitty cat headphones, her GameGirl, a few boxes of chocky, a magazine or two, half a dozen gel pens, a crumpled pack of tissues from six months ago, just in case...

accessories.name: Ring of Withering
accessories.profile: Alastor Velarius, the venerated Bergarian sorcerer, disappeared after the reigning Emperor accused him of treason. He took refuge in the southern kingdom of Rigland, but never let it be said he went into hiding.

accessories.name: Dragonfire Flask
accessories.profile: Last Bastion's citizens know well the scarlet glint of dragonfire. Even the most outspoken don't dare approach a soldier with a flask on their belt. The tar-like substance ignites on impact, instantly burning its targets to ash, whether they be undead soldiers or unruly rebels.

accessories.name: Tropical Timekeeper
accessories.profile: Time moves differently in summer. Lazy afternoons drift by as slowly as the clouds overhead, yet the season itself passes in the blink of an eye. Why does this happen? Is there an explanation, or does the heat simply drive the world mad?

accessories.name: Elegant Sun Hat
accessories.profile: Woven from fine, lightweight straw, anyone who wears this hat will be spared the glare of the summer sun. Oddly enough, a cool breeze always wafts through its ribbons, no matter how hot or how muggy the weather.

accessories.name: Holy Maiden's Lumiary
accessories.profile: Many in the kingdom of Belterre have a humble Lumiary -- that is, a string of prayer beads meant to steady concentration and encourage fervent prayer. Only the Lumiary belonging to the Holy Maiden, however, has the privilege to be made of crystal and gold.

accessories.name: Shield of the Six
accessories.profile: Fire. Water. Storm. Earth. Light. Shadow.

accessories.name: Crown of Hymelia
accessories.profile: After Hymelia found riches in their bordering mountains, the Hymelian royal family used their newfound wealth to forge themselves a crown. The people marvel at its magnificence when the king wears it in public, but some whisper that the gold might be better spent feeding his subjects than dazzling them.

accessories.name: Leather Raiment
accessories.profile: When she was promoted to Vice Commander, Ludmilla received this distinctive jacket from Astrid's father. More lightweight than armor, yet sturdy enough to deflect both blades and claws, she deemed it suitable protection from any threat she might face. Few have seen her without it since.

accessories.name: Valkyrie Crest
accessories.profile: The mark of Last Bastion's Valkyries. These elite soldiers have proved their valor against the undead, and can leave the city whenever they choose. Many envy this honor. Few within Last Bastion's walls have the same freedom.

accessories.name: Mortal Timepiece
accessories.profile: A magnificent clock crafted by Chronos, the Primordial of Time. No matter what calamities it suffers, no matter how long it ticks away, its hands will never fall behind. Some say it controls the flow of time itself.

accessories.name: Astrid's Hairpin
accessories.profile: A life of extravagance. From her infancy, everything she could have ever desired was already within reach.

accessories.name: Rizette's Pouch
accessories.profile: A regular pouch that used to be sold in the village of Westcarte. It is not particuarly fancy or special, but a lot can fit into it without getting cumbersome for the wearer. Also, it is more durable than it looks, providing some protection in addition to transport. Most importantly however, it is full of precious memories of a home that no longer exists.

accessories.name: Moondrop Pearl
accessories.profile: On Laomis, it's commonly said that when the moon is full, oysters rise to the surface of the ocean and open themselves wide. Then, moonlight crystallizes inside them, and becomes a pearl. You may laugh, but if you hold this pearl up alongside the full moon, you'll see that they glow with the same radiance.

accessories.name: Swim Ring
accessories.profile: A circular bladder made from a mysterious, unknowable substance. It can be filled with a surprising amount of air. Astrid seems quite taken with it. "Isn't it fascinating? This ring floats on water!"

accessories.name: Inheritor's Bangle
accessories.profile: A piece made by Gilgan in his apprenticeship, once worn by the hero Druke. It has been reforged by his hand, and passed on to the hero of the next generation.

accessories.name: Ludmilla's Bracer
accessories.profile: The right vambrace from Marshal Ludmilla's armor. As strong and sturdy as the woman who wears it, this armor is a symbol of her resolve to protect the weak, shelter the helpless, and strike back against the forces of Darkness.

accessories.name: Oumon Yoroi
accessories.profile: A fanciful suit of armor found at the foot of Oumei's tree. It shows no wear or any sign of age, and practically hums with magical power and the waking energy of springtime. The faint, lovely scent of cherry blossoms surrounds it always.

accessories.name: Luna's Notes
accessories.profile: A haphazard, handwritten book of notes on monsters, their habitats and traits, and much more. Despite the messy construction, the information inside is minutely detailed and accurate.

accessories.name: Tavun Rabbit
accessories.profile: The illustrious, and insufferable, Lord Tavun Rabbitus XII, twelfth of his line, first among peers and Lady Alice's very best friend. Or possibly, just an ordinary stuffed rabbit. It's hard to be sure.

accessories.name: Dragon Rings
accessories.profile: Rings imbued with the power of two of Erden's great dragons.

accessories.name: Szi Flame
accessories.profile: The art of spinning flame into a glass orb is highly regarded by the Szi. These flames are invaluable on cold and dark nights.

accessories.name: Red Knight Helm
accessories.profile: The trademark red helmet worn by the Red Knights. Though uncomfortable, it is made with the finest quality metal and offers great protection.

accessories.name: Cursed Pin
accessories.profile: A malignant-looking brooch stolen from the barrow of a wicked king.

accessories.name: Ptaki Diadem
accessories.profile: A diadem worn by high-ranking members of the Ptaki, an order of female warriors from an island north of Westland.

accessories.name: Ptaki Cape
accessories.profile: A cape worn by the Ptaki, an order of female warriors from an island north of Westland.

accessories.name: Hook Knife
accessories.profile: An elaborate blade once carried by the brazen captain of a nefarious pirate fleet.

accessories.name: Ptaki Circlet
accessories.profile: A tiara worn during the coming-of-age ceremony of the Ptaki, an order of female warriors from an island north of Westland.

accessories.name: Ritual Knife
accessories.profile: A small but wicked blade used in the ceremonies of the Ivari, a nature-worshipping community from northern Rigland.

accessories.name: Bronze Axe
accessories.profile: A ceremonial axe that once hung in the quarters of the head miner of Gamlan.

accessories.name: Pretty Jewel
accessories.profile: A trinket purchased by a traveler in a distant land, crafted from a mineral not found in Westland.

accessories.name: Vigor Vial
accessories.profile: A vial containing an energizing tonic.

accessories.name: Strike Skirt
accessories.profile: A crimson skirt worn by many of the Red Dragon Knights.

accessories.name: Fancy Pin
accessories.profile: A pin favored by Rigland's nobles.

accessories.name: Lilac Drops
accessories.profile: Earrings once worn by an elven prince.

accessories.name: Strong Arm
accessories.profile: A young man had this arm brace forged to keep his true love safe on the battlefield.

accessories.name: Wild Rings
accessories.profile: Rings that make the wearer feel more aggressive.

accessories.name: Stout Belt
accessories.profile: A well-crafted piece of waist armor, forged by the artisans of Urg Roa.

accessories.name: Wise Ring
accessories.profile: A ring said to enhance the wisdom of the wearer.

accessories.name: Vim Flask
accessories.profile: A flask containing an energizing tonic.

accessories.name: Steel Fist
accessories.profile: An enchanted gauntlet, the forgotten heirloom of a disgraced noble house.

accessories.name: Gem Bangle
accessories.profile: A remnant of the Old Kingdom.

accessories.name: Hawk Coin
accessories.profile: The lucky coin of a jester.

accessories.name: Cobra Rod
accessories.profile: A sinister-looking cane.

accessories.name: Leaf Blade
accessories.profile: A small elven blade, light but strong.

accessories.name: Pickaxe
accessories.profile: A sturdy pickaxe.

accessories.name: Sturdy Mail
accessories.profile: Armor wrought from a rare metal found only in the Gamlan Mines
